meanings.definition: A chemical compound derived from amyl alcohol.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the properties of amyl in the lab.
meanings.sent2: The amyl compound is commonly used in the production of perfumes.
meanings.sent3: The amyl compound decided to throw a party for all the other chemicals.
meanings.sent4: The amyl compound danced with joy as it bonded with other molecules.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant color of the amyl compound made it stand out among the rest.

meanings.definition: A type of group of atoms in organic chemistry.
meanings.sent1: Organic chemistry students learned about the structure of amyl in class.
meanings.sent2: The amyl group plays a crucial role in many organic reactions.
meanings.sent3: The amyl group was the leader of the atom gang in the molecule.
meanings.sent4: The amyl group held the atoms together like a strong bond of friendship.
meanings.sent5: The unique shape of the amyl group made it easy to identify in the compound.

meanings.definition: A type of nitrite used in medicine.
meanings.sent1: Doctors prescribed the amyl nitrite to help patients with heart conditions.
meanings.sent2: The amyl nitrite is known for its vasodilator effects.
meanings.sent3: The amyl nitrite joked with the other medicines about their side effects.
meanings.sent4: The amyl nitrite worked like a superhero to open up blocked blood vessels.
meanings.sent5: The quick action of the amyl nitrite saved the patient's life during the emergency.
